aboutCompare: Misaligned biorhythm compatibility between two people can lead to increased tension and discord.
aboutCycles: Biorhythms are natural cycles that influence the states of our minds and bodies. The three primary cycles are:
aboutEmotional: • {{biorhythm}} cycle governing mood and emotional stability ({{days}} days)
aboutIntellectual: • {{biorhythm}} cycle influencing mental clarity and concentration ({{days}} days)
aboutPhases: Each cycle moves through high, low, and critical phases. During the critical phase a cycle crosses from high to low or from low to high. It is at this time – when the body and mind are out of sync – that individuals may experience a higher likelihood of stress, accidents, or mistakes.
aboutPhysical: • {{biorhythm}} cycle affecting strength and energy ({{days}} days)
